name: Importation of aerial common fireworks, special fireworks, or both, for public display
text: Aerial common fireworks, special fireworks, or both, shall only be imported and stored, if necessary, in an amount sufficient for an anticipated three-month inventory; provided that if a licensee under section 132D-7 provides aerial common fireworks, special fireworks, or both, for public displays as allowed under section 132D-16 more than once a month, the licensee may import or store, if necessary, sufficient aerial common fireworks, special fireworks, or both, for a six-month inventory. [L 2000, c 233, §2]
